5.6 Lyceum may also share Personal Data to assist investigation and prevention of illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person, violations of Lyceum's Terms, or as otherwise required by law.
In the absence of a need to retain Personal Data under Section 9.1. above, Lyceum will either delete or aggregate it in accordance with the Terms or, if this is not possible then Lyceum will securely store your Personal Data and isolate it from any further Processing until deletion is possible.
Lyceum may also collect or receive your Personal Information from other sources such as: a) Lyceum's business or channel partners through which you create or access your Account, such as marketing service providers, social media services or apps or websites that use Lyceum's APIs or whose APIs Lyceum uses.
Lyceum may also disclose your Personal Data: a) As required to comply with applicable law or regulation, or to comply with law enforcement.

Lyceum will normally collect Personal Information from you only where it is needed to perform a contract with you, where the processing is in Our legitimate interests and not overridden by your data protection interests or fundamental rights and freedoms, or where Lyceum has your consent.
Lyceum will retain your Personal Information for as long as necessary to provide you with the websites and apps you are eligible to use and as needed to comply with our legal obligations and enforce our agreements.
Please note that Lyceum needs to retain certain Personal Information about you for legal and internal business reasons, such as fraud prevention.
